data.description:
PataLand is Social Entertainment Metaverse where people can gather to socialize while enjoying and engaging with their beloved performers.

Find peace amidst the hustle and bustle of daily routines, meet new friends, join fan communities, and watch virtual concerts from your favorite bands or singers, all with PataLand and your friends or loved ones.

Get a new experience with PataLand to feel the atmosphere of a live concert in the middle of a private island without leaving the comfort of your

changelog.change_log:
- Login: Secure user login system implemented.
- Signup: New users can create accounts securely.
- Guest: Option to play as a guest without registration.
- Inventory: Players can view and manage their collected items.
- Shop: In-game shop where players can purchase items using game currency.
- Daily Rewards: Players receive rewards for logging in daily.
- Reaction: Players can now give reactions with a popup above their head.
- Pet System: Players can adopt and care for virtual pets.
- Create Room: Players can create rooms for multiplayer interactions.
- Join Room: Option to join existing rooms for collaborative play, improved functionality for joining rooms within the game.
- PataLawan (Player vs Titan) Minigame: New minigame where players face off against titans.
- Climbing Minigame: A new climbing minigame to test players' skills.
- Japanese-Solar Punk Island: Explore the beautifully designed Japanese-Solar Punk Island.
- Mini-map: A mini map to help players navigate the game world.
